name: truth-core-monorepo
description: Truth Core - Deterministic evidence-based verification framework (Monorepo)

scripts.verify: pnpm run verify:python && pnpm run verify:ts
scripts.verify:python: pnpm run python:lint && pnpm run python:typecheck && pnpm run python:test
scripts.verify:ts: pnpm run ts:lint && pnpm run ts:typecheck && pnpm run ts:test && pnpm run ts:build
scripts.format: pnpm run python:format && pnpm run ts:format
scripts.format:check: pnpm run python:format:check && pnpm run ts:format:check
scripts.lint: pnpm run python:lint && pnpm run ts:lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run python:lint:fix && pnpm run ts:lint:fix
scripts.test: pnpm run python:test && pnpm run ts:test
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run python:typecheck && pnpm run ts:typecheck
scripts.ci: pnpm run verify:ci && pnpm run contracts:check && pnpm run doctor

author: Truth Core Contributors
